advertisingText: Please follow @awuahbenjamin as he is a helper of people in need and a hive promoter
optionalText: @awuahbenjamin lives in ghana and is engaged in the Hiveghana community. He helps people in need and writes about it in Hive.
lastWeekCampaign: Last week I celebrated Karneval in my hometown. These means my freinds and I walked in costumes through the streets and pubs, we drank beer and danced to the music. So I took the whole week off and didnt work neither on my job nor on Hive.
lastWeekReport: Put some text of your last weeks (before you start the report) actions here
